clinical_study.brief_title: Health Economics Evaluation of the Management of Severe Postpartum Hemorrhage: Comparison of Recombinant Activated Factor VII Strategy to the Reference Strategy

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective of this project is to assess the average cost of the treatment of bleeding postpartum with recombinant activated factor VII (NovoSeven®) and compare it to the reference strategy. Costs related to medicine NovoSeven® can generate surplus, but it also avoids in some cases very costly invasive procedures. It will be interesting to compare the average cost of the complete strategies supported.

study_pop.textblock: The population of this study is the population described in "rhuFVIIa in Post-partum Hemorrhage " NCT00370877
